overview: In the small Yakut village of Krasnaya Zvezda, a grand event is planned-the celebration of the 75th anniversary of the village.  The main character named Coca was assigned to design the event. As a responsible person, he took up his task with all diligence and diligence, but suddenly a nephew named Micheer is brought to him from the city. The little guest turns out to be a real disaster for the calm and measured life of Coca.  Due to the fault of Michere, preparations for the anniversary are disrupted. Will the Cook be able to fix everything before the holiday and most importantly, make friends with his restless nephew.
title: Юбилей
